channel.title: Jacob Heden Malm
channel.description: Recent content on Jacob Heden Malm

item.title: Building a chess MCP
item.description:
Recent life

I recently found myself with more free time and less direction than I’ve had since joining the prestigious ranks of real adults sometime in my early 20s. It’s been fun.

I spent the first week doing absolutely nothing productive. I tented for 4 days somewhere in the forest in southern Sweden while attending a techno festival, spent a combined 20 hours on trains to and from Cologne in order to attend a Denzel Curry concert with an old friend, and started reading a new book, Growth, so far so good!

item.title: On leaving Spotify
item.description:
Starting as an intern

Exactly 3 years ago, on the 13th of June 2022, I started my internship at Spotify. At the time I was based in Stockholm, on my way to finishing up a master’s degree in machine learning at KTH (hah!).

Spotify had been my dream company for a while before that. It was a tech product I genuinely loved using as a consumer, a huge success story closely affilliated with my own university, and it was chock full of cool engineering and ML feats obvious to any tech-literate user of the app.

item.title: About
item.description:
Hello, I’m Jacob Heden Malm. I am a software engineer based out of Copenhagen. I will try to write regularly about my journey into entrepreneurship here, as I have recently quit my job at Spotify.

  • If you’re curious, here’s my CV
